alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Clay and south central Duval Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nas Jax, or near Mandarin, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Mandarin, Nas Jax and Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval
